entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain and fog ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
